metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19755 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.Description: There is an illegal address access at asm/preproc.c (function: is_mmacro) in Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.14rc16 that will cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds array access) because a certain conversion can result in a negative integer.

criterions.comment: nasm package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
